newsitem.title: USA: Amoco Corp Q4 net rises on higher revenues.
newsitem.headline: Amoco Corp Q4 net rises on higher revenues.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: 1996 Q4 net and shr include $90 million gain on reduction in LIFO inventory levels. Excluding that amount, 1996 Q4 net was $781 million, or $1.56/shr.

1995 Q4 net and shr include charge of $380 million after-tax on impairment of long-lived assets and gain of $83 million after-tax on sale of Amoco Motor Club. Excluding those amounts, 1995 Q4 net was $504 million, or $1.02/shr.

By sector for 1996 Q4, U.S. exploration and production earnings $393 million vs loss of $60 million, including $23 million impairment charge, in 1995 Q4; overseas exploration and production earnings $141 million vs $94 million in 1995 Q4; Canadian exploration and production earnings $154 million vs loss of $60 million, including $93 million impairment charge, in 1995 Q4.
1996 Q4 chemicals earnings $105 million vs $188 million in 1995 Q4. 1996 Q4 petroleum products earnings $151 million vs $126 million.
1996 worldwide capital and exploration spending $4.6 bln vs $4.1 bln in 1995.
